entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor WebApp] RenderMode InteractiveAuto and Could not reconnect to the server message #53120
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, connectionclosehttps, fortunes_ef #53115
  • Injecting DBContext in Validation Attribute randomly throws error: "Cannot access a disposed context instance" #53114
  • Create a .NET Upgrade Assistant extension for upgrading from Blazor Server and hosted Blazor WebAssembly apps to Blazor Web #53113
  • HttpRequest.QueryString not correctly build after decoding #53110
  • Implement QuickGrid.OverscanCount #53108
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: EventLog access is not supported on this platform #53106
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #53105
  • MapGroup with RoutePattern with RequiredValues of RoutePattern.RequiredValueAny registers incorrect URL routing endpoints #53104
  • Update SignalR TransportProtocols doc #53103

Closed

  • IIS AspNetCore Module V2 returns 10s of 503 error and "Failed to gracefully shutdown applicaiton" warning when recycling a Hello world demo #49350
  • Blazor Standalone Webassembly - Has no way to call Azure B2C edit profile user flow #53084
  • SignalR throws error on interface type method parameters (both client and server side) #53001
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #53069
  • quickgrid blazorwebassmelby with .net8.0 #53041
  • Corrupted Padding Bits Brotli Decode Blazor Azure Static Web App #52735
    8.0.x
  • Server-side Blazor perf infrastructure and hello world perf test #4052
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Synchronize Blazor WASM and Blazor Hybrid Perf Testing #42862
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Missing Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props #53112
  • How to bind a complex string type to Checkbox in Blazor? #53083
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #52993
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52991
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52987
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52986
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52981
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot #52958
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot #52894
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52866
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52865
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #52859
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52858
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52852
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52851
  • In ASP.NET 8, IReadOnlyCollection<> controller parameters do not bind from request body by default #52962
  • A way to modify prerendered page html #53044
  • Blazor Web App Client not registering a service/ DI not working #53042
  • NavigationException when attempting to navigate after submitting a form #49143 still continue #53040
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53094
  • Perf regression: caching #53093
  • [Blazor] Disconnect alternative proposal #39409
    Planning: WebUI
  • Unexpected binding behavior (with addl side ?s) for Blazor docs #40798
    Planning: WebUI
  • [SignalR] Stateful reconnect #46691
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery triggers OnParametersSet after Navigation using AuthorizeRouteView #48241
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Enhance navigation different interaction behavior #49210
    Planning: WebUI
  • Shouldn't the .NET 8 Blazor Web App template show client-server communication for WebAssembly SPAs? #52285
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Update other packages to bundle with rollup #53117
    area-blazor
  • Bump karma-sauce-launcher and saucelabs versions #53116
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Skip failing Libuv test on Alpine #52912
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, area-networking, 6.0.27
  • [release/8.0] Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates (#52428) #52461
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix Blazor enhanced form bugs #52765
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `76bb2af` to `dddb219` #53077
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.16
  • Update branding to 6.0.27 #53096
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.27
  • Update auto-milestones for Feb #53121
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 7.0.16 #53097
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.16
  • Update branding to 8.0.2 #53098
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.2
  • Update SDK version #53101
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Switch to rollup for bundling #53095
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52103
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix deserializing null properties to Protobuf types #52468
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix reading null struct property value in gRPC JSON transcoding #52469
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix auto import of proto files when gRPC JSON transcoding is a transitive reference #52470
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52790
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-hosting, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix app_offline detection for some OSes #52810
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix handling of default values in RDG #53047
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `76bb2af` to `dddb219` #53079
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Annotate Http.Connections for trimming #52918
    area-signalr, linker-friendliness
  • Add polymorphic support to SignalR STJ #53035
    area-signalr
  • Use an image w/ node for SourceBuild #52969
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • [blazor][wasm] Remove legacy interop #52732
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 9 Planning
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 8 Planning
